name: fatmcgav-netapp
summary: NetApp Network Device support for Puppet
author: fatmcgav
description:
Module to extend Puppet Network Device functionality to support NetApp filers. 

Overview:
The NetApp network device module is designed to add support for managing NetApp filer configuration using Puppet and its Network Device functionality.

The Netapp network device module has been written and tested against NetApp OnTap 8.0.4 7-mode. 
However it may well be compatible with other OnTap versions. 

Features:
The following items are supported:
* Creation, modification and deletion of volumes, including auto-increment, snapshot schedules and volume options.
* Creation, modification and deletion of QTrees. 
* Creation, modification and deletion of NFS Exports, including NFS Export security. 
* Creation, modification and deletion of users, groups and roles. 
* Creation of snapmirror relationships. 
* Creation of snapmirror schedules.

properties.name: anon
properties.doc: Should the export support anonymous root access.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The export path. Valid format is /vol/[volume_name](/[qtree_name]).

parameters.name: persistent
parameters.doc: Should this be a persistent export? Defaults to true.

parameters.name: path
parameters.doc: The filer path to export. If not specified, uses :name value

types.name: netapp_export
types.doc: Manage Netapp NFS Export creation, modification and deletion.

properties.name: roles
properties.doc: List of roles for this group. Comma separate multiple values.

parameters.name: groupname
parameters.doc: The group name.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.doc: Group comment

types.name: netapp_group
types.doc: Manage Netapp Group creation, modification and deletion.

properties.name: message
properties.doc: The message to be sent to the log.

parameters.name: withpath
parameters.doc: Whether to show the full object path. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: An arbitrary tag for your own reference; the name of the message.

types.name: netapp_notify
types.doc: Sends an arbitrary message to the agent run-time log.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The qtree name.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.doc: The volume to create qtree against.

types.name: netapp_qtree
types.doc: Manage Netapp Qtree creation, modification and deletion.

properties.name: capabilities
properties.doc: List of capabilities for this role. Comma separate multiple values.

parameters.name: rolename
parameters.doc: The role name.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.doc: Role comment

types.name: netapp_role
types.doc: Manage Netapp Role creation, modification and deletion.

parameters.name: source_location
parameters.doc: The source location.

parameters.name: source_snapshot
parameters.doc: The source snapshot name

parameters.name: destination_location
parameters.doc: The destination location.

parameters.name: destination_snapshot
parameters.doc: The destination snapshot.

parameters.name: max_transfer_rate
parameters.doc: The max transfer rate, in KB/s. Defaults to unlimited.

types.name: netapp_snapmirror
types.doc: Manage Netapp Snapmirror creation, modification and deletion.

parameters.name: source_location
parameters.doc: The source location.

parameters.name: destination_location
parameters.doc: The destination location.

parameters.name: max_transfer_rate
parameters.doc: The max transfer rate, in KB/s. Defaults to unlimited.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.doc:
The minutes in the hour for schedule to be set.
      Can be single value between 0 and 59, 
      comma seperated list (1,7,14), 
      range (2-10),
      range with divider (1-59/3),
      * to match all
      or - to match none.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.doc:
The hour(s) in the day for schedule to be set.
      Can be single value between 1 and 24, 
      comma seperated list (1,7,14), 
      range (2-10),
      range with divider (1-24/3),
      * to match all
      or - to match none.

parameters.name: days_of_week
parameters.doc:
The days of week for schedule to be set. 
      Can be single value between 0 and 6, inclusive, with 0 being Sunday, 
      or must be name of the day (e.g. Tuesday),
      comma sepeated list (1,3,5),
      range (2-5),
      * to match all
      or - to match none.

parameters.name: days_of_month
parameters.doc:
The days of month for schedule to be set.
      Can be single value between 1 and 31, 
      comma seperated list (1,7,14), 
      range (2-10),
      range with divider (1-30/7),
      * to match all
      or - to match none.

parameters.name: restart
parameters.doc: The restart mode to use when transfer interrupted. Allowed values are: always, never and restart.

parameters.name: connection_mode
parameters.doc: The connection mode to use between source and destination.

types.name: netapp_snapmirror_schedule
types.doc: Manage Netapp Snapmirror schedule creation, modification and deletion.

properties.name: passminage
properties.doc: Number of days that this user's password must be active before the user can change it. Default value is 0.

properties.name: passmaxage
properties.doc: Number of days that this user's password can be active before the user must change it. Default value is 2^31-1 days.

properties.name: groups
properties.doc: List of groups for this user account. Comma separate multiple values.

parameters.name: username
parameters.doc: The user username.

parameters.name: password
parameters.doc: The user password. Minimum length is 8 characters, must contain at-least one number.

parameters.name: status
parameters.doc: Status of user account. Valid values are: enabled, disabled and expired. Cannot be modified via API.

types.name: netapp_user
types.doc: Manage Netapp User creation, modification and deletion.

properties.name: initsize
properties.doc: The initial volume size. Valid format is 1-9(kmgt).

properties.name: snapreserve
properties.doc: The percentage of space to reserve for snapshots.

properties.name: autoincrement
properties.doc: Should volume size auto-increment be enabled? Defaults to `true`.

properties.name: snapschedule
properties.doc: The volume snapshot schedule, in a hash format. Valid keys are: 'minutes', 'hours', 'days', 'weeks', 'which-hours', 'which-minutes'.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The volume name. Valid characters are a-z, 1-9 & underscore.

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.doc: The aggregate this volume should be created in.

parameters.name: languagecode
parameters.doc: The language code this volume should use.

parameters.name: spaceres
parameters.doc: The space reservation mode.

types.name: netapp_volume
types.doc: Manage Netapp Volume creation, modification and deletion.
